6// RenderBufferMtl.mm:
7// Implements the class methods for RenderBufferMtl.

10#include "libANGLE/renderer/metal/RenderBufferMtl.h"
11
12#include "libANGLE/renderer/metal/ContextMtl.h"
13#include "libANGLE/renderer/metal/ImageMtl.h"
14#include "libANGLE/renderer/metal/mtl_format_utils.h"
15#include "libANGLE/renderer/metal/mtl_utils.h"

17namespace rx
18{
19
20RenderbufferMtl::RenderbufferMtl(const gl::RenderbufferState &state) : RenderbufferImpl(state) {}
21
22RenderbufferMtl::~RenderbufferMtl() {}
23
24void RenderbufferMtl::onDestroy(const gl::Context *context)
25{
26 releaseTexture();
27}
28
29void RenderbufferMtl::releaseTexture()
30{
31 mTexture = nullptr;
32 mImplicitMSTexture = nullptr;
33}
34
35angle::Result RenderbufferMtl::setStorageImpl(const gl::Context *context,
36 GLsizei samples,
37 GLenum internalformat,
38 GLsizei width,
39 GLsizei height)
40{
41 ContextMtl *contextMtl = mtl::GetImpl(context);
42
43 if (mTexture != nullptr && mTexture->valid())
44 {
45 // Check against the state if we need to recreate the storage.
46 if (internalformat != mState.getFormat().info->internalFormat ||
47 static_cast<GLsizei>(width) != mState.getWidth() ||
48 static_cast<GLsizei>(height) != mState.getHeight() ||
49 static_cast<GLsizei>(samples) != mState.getSamples())
50 {
51 releaseTexture();
52 }
53 }
54
55 const gl::InternalFormat &internalFormat = gl::GetSizedInternalFormatInfo(internalformat);
56 angle::FormatID angleFormatId =
57 angle::Format::InternalFormatToID(internalFormat.sizedInternalFormat);
58 mFormat = contextMtl->getPixelFormat(angleFormatId);
59
60 uint32_t actualSamples;
61 if (samples == 0)
62 {
63 actualSamples = 1;
64 }
65 else
66 {
67 // We always start at at least 2 samples
68 actualSamples = static_cast<uint32_t>(std::max<size_t>(2, samples));
69
70 const gl::TextureCaps &textureCaps =
71 contextMtl->getTextureCaps().get(mFormat.intendedFormatId);
72 actualSamples = textureCaps.getNearestSamples(actualSamples);
73 ANGLE_MTL_CHECK(contextMtl, actualSamples != 0, GL_INVALID_VALUE);
74 }
75
76 if ((mTexture == nullptr || !mTexture->valid()) && (width != 0 && height != 0))
77 {
78 if (actualSamples == 1 || (mFormat.getCaps().resolve))
79 {
80 ANGLE_TRY(mtl::Texture::Make2DTexture(contextMtl, mFormat, static_cast<uint32_t>(width),
81 static_cast<uint32_t>(height), 1,
82 /* renderTargetOnly */ false,
83 /* allowFormatView */ mFormat.hasDepthAndStencilBits(), &mTexture));
84
85 // Use implicit resolve for depth stencil texture whenever possible. This is because
86 // for depth stencil texture, if stencil needs to be blitted, a formatted clone has
87 // to be created. And it is expensive to clone a multisample texture.
88 if (actualSamples > 1)
89 {
90 // This format must supports implicit resolve
91 ASSERT(mFormat.getCaps().resolve);
92
93 ANGLE_TRY(mtl::Texture::Make2DMSTexture(
94 contextMtl, mFormat, static_cast<uint32_t>(width),
95 static_cast<uint32_t>(height), actualSamples,
96 /* renderTargetOnly */ true,
97 /* allowFormatView */ mFormat.hasDepthAndStencilBits(), &mImplicitMSTexture));
98 }
99 }
100 else
101 {
102 ANGLE_TRY(mtl::Texture::Make2DMSTexture(contextMtl, mFormat,
103 static_cast<uint32_t>(width),
104 static_cast<uint32_t>(height), actualSamples,
105 /* renderTargetOnly */ false,
106 /* allowFormatView */ mFormat.hasDepthAndStencilBits(), &mTexture));
107 }
108
109 mRenderTarget.setWithImplicitMSTexture(mTexture, mImplicitMSTexture, mtl::kZeroNativeMipLevel, 0, mFormat);
110
111 // For emulated channels that GL texture intends to not have,
112 // we need to initialize their content.
113 bool emulatedChannels = mtl::IsFormatEmulated(mFormat);
114 if (emulatedChannels)
115 {
116 gl::ImageIndex index;
117
118 if (actualSamples > 1)
119 {
120 index = gl::ImageIndex::Make2DMultisample();
121 }
122 else
123 {
124 index = gl::ImageIndex::Make2D(0);
125 }
126
127 ANGLE_TRY(mtl::InitializeTextureContents(context, mTexture, mFormat, mtl::ImageNativeIndex(index, 0)));
128 if (mImplicitMSTexture)
129 {
130 ANGLE_TRY(mtl::InitializeTextureContents(context, mImplicitMSTexture, mFormat,
131 mtl::ImageNativeIndex(gl::ImageIndex::Make2DMultisample(), 0)));
132 }
133 } // if (emulatedChannels)
134 bool isDepthStencil = mFormat.hasDepthOrStencilBits();
135 if(isDepthStencil)
136 {
137 gl::ImageIndex index;
138 if (actualSamples > 1)
139 {
140 index = gl::ImageIndex::Make2DMultisample();
141 }
142 else
143 {
144 index = gl::ImageIndex::Make2D(0);
145 }
146 ANGLE_TRY(mtl::InitializeDepthStencilTextureContentsGPU(context, mTexture, mFormat, mtl::ImageNativeIndex(index, 0)));
147 if (mImplicitMSTexture)
148 {
149 ANGLE_TRY(mtl::InitializeDepthStencilTextureContentsGPU(context, mImplicitMSTexture, mFormat,
150 mtl::ImageNativeIndex(gl::ImageIndex::Make2DMultisample(), 0)));
151 }
152 }
153 }
154
155 return angle::Result::Continue;
156}
157
158angle::Result RenderbufferMtl::setStorage(const gl::Context *context,
159 GLenum internalformat,
160 GLsizei width,
161 GLsizei height)
162{
163 return setStorageImpl(context, 0, internalformat, width, height);
164}
165
166angle::Result RenderbufferMtl::setStorageMultisample(const gl::Context *context,
167 GLsizei samples,
168 GLenum internalformat,
169 GLsizei width,
170 GLsizei height,
171 gl::MultisamplingMode mode)
172{
173 return setStorageImpl(context, samples, internalformat, width, height);
174}
175
176angle::Result RenderbufferMtl::setStorageEGLImageTarget(const gl::Context *context,
177 egl::Image *image)
178{
179 releaseTexture();
180
181 ContextMtl *contextMtl = mtl::GetImpl(context);
182
183 ImageMtl *imageMtl = mtl::GetImpl(image);
184 mTexture = imageMtl->getTexture();
185
186 const angle::FormatID angleFormatId =
187 angle::Format::InternalFormatToID(image->getFormat().info->sizedInternalFormat);
188 mFormat = contextMtl->getPixelFormat(angleFormatId);
189
190 mRenderTarget.set(mTexture, mtl::kZeroNativeMipLevel, 0, mFormat);
191
192 return angle::Result::Continue;
193}
194
195angle::Result RenderbufferMtl::getAttachmentRenderTarget(const gl::Context *context,
196 GLenum binding,
197 const gl::ImageIndex &imageIndex,
198 GLsizei samples,
199 FramebufferAttachmentRenderTarget **rtOut)
200{
201 ASSERT(mTexture && mTexture->valid());
202 *rtOut = &mRenderTarget;
203 return angle::Result::Continue;
204}
205
206angle::Result RenderbufferMtl::initializeContents(const gl::Context *context,
207 const gl::ImageIndex &imageIndex)
208{
209 if (imageIndex.valid())
210 return mtl::InitializeTextureContents(context, mTexture, mFormat,
211 mtl::ImageNativeIndex::FromBaseZeroGLIndex(imageIndex));
212 else
213 return mtl::InitializeTextureContents(context, mTexture, mFormat,
214 mtl::ImageNativeIndex::FromBaseZeroGLIndex(gl::ImageIndex::Make2D(0)));
215}
216}
